body: Honors course in microprocessors: architecture, design, assembly language, programming, interfacing, bus structure, and interface circuits and their use in embedded systems.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPEN331)(Additional Attributes: Honors)

title: CMPEN 472H: Honors Microprocessors and Embedded Systems
